interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: REALHER Cheek Trio - Ultimate Glow Getter - Blush, Highlighter, & Bronzer Contour Palette - High Quality, Silky Formulation
Review Date: 2021/04/25
Store: RealHer
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.56 x 0.67 inches; 3.25 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a very pretty contour kit. It has a blush color, hi lighter and a darker contour color. I like that the packaging isn’t huge which makes it good for travel. The colors are very pretty and they last on my face all day. I would buy this again.
Review Title: Pretty contour
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Caudalie Favorites Set {'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.54 x 2.05 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2346203'} I am a big fan of caudalie products. This is a mini size kit and is perfect for travel. There are five products in this kit. I have sensitive skin and I always trust caudalie! Plus, the products always have a pleasant smell. Favorite No Brainer Gentle Facial Cleanser, 6 fl. oz, For Dry & Sensitive Skin, Leaves Skin Feeling Clean, Soft and Hydrated, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein & Amino Acids Restores Skin by Higher Education Skincare Higher Education {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 2.3 x 2.3 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381030056'} I really like this face wash. I've used it just in my hands to wash my face really quickly, and I've also used it with my facial cleansing brush to get a deeper clean. It smells amazing. It has a thicker consistency and lathers, which I really like because it makes my face feel extra clean. Would buy this again! Would repurchase! LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'} This has a great smell but I found the product was too thin for my damaged hair. I prefer a thicker hair cream spray. If you’re looking for a very light spray, you may enjoy this product. Not thick enough Caudalie Vinosource SOS Intense Hydration Set: Hydrating Trio for Sensitive Skin including a Daily Foam Cleanser, Hydrating Serum, Facial Moisturizer {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 5.35 x 2.64 inches; 14.5 Ounces'} I’ve used this brand for years so I was excited to find this value pack! The packaging is beautiful and could make a nice Christmas gift. This is a great starter set to introduce someone to the brand. It comes with the cleanser, cream and serum. All the products are high quality and have been on my go to list for years. This is an excellent value. Value pack Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} This is a really fun set and would make a good gift. It comes with 7 masks and lists what order to use them in. Varies from hydrating, brightening to clarifying masks.

These are all cloth masks and easy to use. After the week my skin did feel very well hydrated. This is a bit expensive for what it is, but is a fun splurge. 7 masks SimpliGrown Bath Co. Pure Cornstarch Talc-Free Baby Powder with Aloe, Vitamins C & B5, Fragrance Free, 4 Oz SIMPLIGROWN ['SimpliGrown Bath Co. knows that you take your baby/toddler seriously, and honestly, we do too. That\'s why our foaming hand soaps, baby wash, baby shampoo, baby conditioner, baby lotion, baby oil, baby powder, and bottle/dish soaps have the best certified organic ingredients and pure essential oil. So every "body" in your family can be safe and clean. Formulated for babies with sensitive skin,this baby powder won\'t irritate the skin. Pediatrician tested and recommended, free from dyes, artificial fragrances, parabens, pthlates, and SLS. Leaping Bunny certified, vegan, gluten-free, and never tested on animals. So honest, we\'ve listed all ingredients on the label! So whether you\'re using with our other SimpliGrown products or just using this baby powder, you will be happy that you have this product in your house.'] {'Brand': 'SIMPLIGROWN', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture', 'Material Feature': 'Vega, Organic, Natural, Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SGBC-BP500-06', 'UPC': '087508176123', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/KI6XB', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} I bought this because I needed something talc and fragrance free. I pay careful attention to what I use on my body and a lot of baby powders have a lot of not so good ingredients. This is a cleaner brand and I would use it again! Cleaner ingredients REALHER Cheek Trio - Ultimate Glow Getter - Blush, Highlighter, & Bronzer Contour Palette - High Quality, Silky Formulation RealHer {'Package Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.56 x 0.67 inches; 3.25 Ounces'} This is a very pretty contour kit. It has a blush color, hi lighter and a darker contour color. I like that the packaging isn’t huge which makes it good for travel. The colors are very pretty and they last on my face all day. I would buy this again. Pretty contour
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Brand Preference**: The user actively favors Caudalie products and seeks value sets to introduce others to the brand, while also being open to high-quality offerings from brands like Higher Education Skincare. They enjoy exploring diverse skincare sets.

- **Skin Sensitivity**: They prioritize products suitable for sensitive skin, emphasizing gentle ingredients for both personal and family use.

- **Product Formulation**: The user enjoys liquid formulations for cleansing but has developed a preference for thicker hair care textures, showcasing a thoughtful approach to formulations across different product categories. Recently, they have also shown interest in versatile makeup kits that offer practical combinations.

- **Convenience**: Values travel-friendly sizes and aesthetically pleasing packaging, indicating a lifestyle that appreciates portability and gift-worthy presentation.

- **Fragrance**: Prefers unscented products, particularly those for sensitive skin, demonstrating a commitment to safety and sensory enjoyment.

- **Quality Standards**: Consistently selects high-quality products with clean and organic ingredients, recognizing significant value in sets and kits.

- **Recent Interaction**: The user appreciates fun and practical sets that enhance their beauty routine, showing an inclination towards high-quality formulations and products that offer enjoyable experiences. They are open to splurging on those that align with their criteria for safety and quality.

Overall, the user is health-conscious, focused on effective skincare and beauty products suitable for sensitive skin, balancing performance, safety, and convenience in their beauty regimen.
